review: Great device with great price. Lots of apps and media to choose from. However 5 GHZ band support is weak. It can only see my router's 5 GHZ SSID if the channel frequency is fixed (Not auto). Search Google and you will see other people have this problem too. Otherwise the Fire Stick will only see 2.4 GHZ SSIDs. Not sure if it is hardware or software issue, but hopefully Amazon can fix it in software updates (which is automatic).
author: Y. Mai

review: I bought this product but I can't even use it. It worked for one day. Now it can't connect to my WiFi network. It say connection good but with problems.I have read all about this product and everyone having the same problem. Amazon needs to get the firmware correct. Very disappointed in a company like Amazon to put out a product that has this many problems. I am running the latest firmware and I have tried all the solutions reccomended by Amazon.
